title: Weather Phenomenon Database (WEAPD)
author: Xiao, Haixia (Nanjing Joint Institute for Atmospheric Sciences)
description: The WEAPD is composed of 11 weather phenomena, and the categories and corresponding number of images included are as follows: hail, snow, lightning, rainbow, rain, dew, sandstorm , rime, frost, glaze and fog/smog. All images are in the JPG format.
subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
